name: NHCR
tag_list: point-of-sale, point-of-sale-hardware, point-of-sale-software, pos, connecticut-pos, retail-pos, restaurant-pos, pci-compliance, surveillance-systems, credit-card-processing, gift-cards
overview:
For over 60 years, NHCR (formerly New Haven Cash Register) has provided a wide range of point of sale (POS) solutions, from traditional touch-screen and retail scanning systems used in liquor and convenience stores to specialty grocery store systems and the latest in tablet-based wireless solutions for restaurants.

As one of the original members of the Retail Solutions Providers Association (RSPA), NHCR carries a complete line of point of sale solutions, network security products, surveillance systems, revenue-generating loyalty programs and secure credit card processing. The Company is RSPA certified for meeting the association’s highest standards and adheres to all PCI DSS compliance regulations related to credit card security.
